pageProduct.name: Palmers Olive Oil Moisture Fill Conditioner 473ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer’s® Olive Oil Formula® Moisture Fill™ Nourishing Oil Conditioner nourishes hair with a blend of precious Marula, Avocado, Argan and 100% Pure Olive oils for perfectly balanced moisture.  This gentle Silicone-Free formula is suitable for all curl textures and ideal for fine hair often weighed down by heavier oils and creams.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

Hair perfecting micro-fillers bond to breaks, splits or roughness on the surface of each strand of hair, resulting in a smooth surface and minimal frizz. The strong lipid content in Jamaican Black Castor Oil also helps relieve dry, itchy scalp while protecting hair from damage due to styling, friction, tangles and chemicals. Moisture Fill™ Technology balances hair porosity to maintain strong hair, resistant to damage.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Glycerin, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Behentrimonium Chloride, Polysorbate 20, Prunus Amydgalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond Oil), Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Perisa Gratissma (Avocado) Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Simmondsa Chinesis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Emblica Officinalis Fruit Extract, Equisetum Arvense Extract, Hyssopus Officinalis Extract, Rosmarius Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Urtica Diocia (Nettle) Extract, Sclerocarya, Birrea Seed Oil, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Tocopherol, Tocopherol Acetate, Panthenol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Isopropyl Alcohol, Disodium EDTA, Cysine Bis-PG Propyl Silanetriol, Alcohol Denat, Sodium Chloride, Benzyl Salicytate, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool.

Directions

After shampooing with Palmer's Olive Oil Formula Moisture Fill Cleansing Oil Shampoo, apply generously to wet hair. Leave on for up to five minutes. Rinse. TIP : Apply conditioner to hair then wrap in a warm towel for 10 minutes for an intensive treatment.
